turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Thai sounds great! But, to be honest, Bangkok Bites... I've heard mixed things. Are there any other Thai places that are REALLY good? And by good, I mean, like, authentic, not just Americanized.
